data.name: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!! Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Gear up with the Mega Man 11 Original Soundtrack, featuring the high-octane music of the full game soundtrack, plus special arrangements of each Robot Master's stage!

The 105+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 391MB for MP3, 933MB for FLAC and 518MB for AAC)

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\Mega Man 11

©CAPCOM CO., LTD.

-Tracklist-


Composed and arranged by Marika Suzuki
Additional arrangements and performances by Ayaka Fukuhara, Yasumasa Kitagawa, Zhenlan Kang, Akiyuki Morimoto, Shinya 'Midnight' Okada, Kota Suzuki, Yoshiya Terayama, Akihiko Narita, and Azusa Kato

Additional sound by Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
Additional lyrics by Masakazu Eguchi


Disc 1:
01 - Prologue - 1:26 - Marika Suzuki
02 - Title - 2:25 - Marika Suzuki
03 - Another Day in the Lab - 1:59 - Marika Suzuki
04 - Evil Machinations - 1:35 - Marika Suzuki
05 - The Courage to Fight - 1:47 - Marika Suzuki
06 - Stage Select - 1:48 - Marika Suzuki
07 - Game Start - 0:11 - Marika Suzuki
08 - Block Man Stage - 3:34 - Marika Suzuki
09 - Acid Man Stage - 3:32 - Marika Suzuki
10 - Impact Man Stage - 3:34 - Marika Suzuki
11 - Bounce Man Stage - 2:06 - Marika Suzuki
12 - Fuse Man Stage - 2:28 - Marika Suzuki
13 - Tundra Man Stage - 3:14 - Marika Suzuki
14 - Torch Man Stage - 2:37 - Marika Suzuki
15 - Blast Man Stage - 2:29 - Marika Suzuki
16 - Boss - 2:15 - Marika Suzuki
17 - Stage Clear - 0:11 - Marika Suzuki
18 - Get a Weapon - 1:56 - Marika Suzuki
19 - Shop - 1:31 - Marika Suzuki
20 - Regretful Memories - 2:29 - Marika Suzuki
21 - Dr. Wily Castle - 0:10 - Marika Suzuki
22 - Dr. Wily Stage Map - 1:36 - Marika Suzuki
23 - Dr. Wily Stage - 3:04 - Marika Suzuki
24 - Dr. Wily Stage Boss - 2:36 - Marika Suzuki
25 - Dr. Wily Machine - 1:59 - Marika Suzuki
26 - Dr. Wily Capsule - 0:07 - Marika Suzuki
27 - Last Battle - 2:18 - Marika Suzuki
28 - Wily's Last Resort - 1:06 - Marika Suzuki
29 - Staff Roll 1 - 1:34 - Marika Suzuki
30 - Staff Roll 2 - 3:07 - Marika Suzuki
31 - Game Menu - 3:09 - Marika Suzuki
32 - Challenges - 2:23 - Marika Suzuki
33 - Challenges (Time Limit Ver.) - 1:11 - Marika Suzuki
34 - Challenges: Results - 1:09 - Marika Suzuki
35 - Game Over - 0:08 - Marika Suzuki

Disc 2:
01 - Block Man Stage (Arranged) - 5:01 - Yasumasa Kitagawa

05 - Fuse Man Stage (Arranged) - 3:19 - Yoshiya Terayama
06 - Tundra Man Stage (Arranged) - 4:19 - Akihiko Narita
07 - Torch Man Stage (Arranged) - 2:48 - Azusa Kato
08 - Blast Man Stage (Arranged) - 3:11 - Yoshiya Terayama
09 - RM11 - 4:31 - Ayaka Fukuhara
10 - Mega Man, Ready! - 0:05 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
11 - Charge Shot - 0:11 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
12 - Activate Speed Gear - 0:09 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
13 - Activate Power Gear - 0:09 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
14 - Activate Double Gear - 0:11 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
15 - Life Lost - 0:08 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
16 - Boss Defeated - 0:10 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa
17 - New Special Weapon - 0:14 - Ryo Yoshii, Yasuyuki Yonezawa

fullgame.name: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.20GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: ・DirectX9.0c is also required ・Hardware specification target　Resolution: 1080P/60FPS　Display Mode: Windows Mode　Anti-aliasing: OFF
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.20GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: ・DirectX9.0c is also required ・Hardware specification target　Resolution: 1080P/60FPS　Display Mode: Windows Mode　Anti-aliasing: ON
